title.title: BALI ATV RIDE AND SPA TOUR
title.text: BALI ATV RIDE AND SPA TOUR
title.html: BALI ATV RIDE AND SPA TOUR

tagline.title: BALI ATV RIDE AND SPA TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITIES FOR ENOJY 2 HOURS ATV RIDE AND THEN CONTINUE ENJOY 2 HOURS SPA PACKAGES
tagline.text: BALI ATV RIDE AND SPA TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITIES FOR ENOJY 2 HOURS ATV RIDE AND THEN CONTINUE ENJOY 2 HOURS SPA PACKAGES
tagline.html: BALI ATV RIDE AND SPA TOUR IS DOUBLE ACTIVITIES FOR ENOJY 2 HOURS ATV RIDE AND THEN CONTINUE ENJOY 2 HOURS SPA PACKAGES

description.text: Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour is Bali Double Activities Tour for enjoy 2 hours adventure of riding atv bike through jungle, local village and river, then continue the tour for enjoy 2 hours spa packages treatment for refresh your mind and body. Is great combination for enjoy atv adventure and then having relaxation in the spa with balinese massages and spa treatments. The first adventure is to ride the ATV bike to go along the prepared track, where you will head to the forest with unspoiled scenery, head to the local village and down a small muddy river where this adds to the level of pleasure on an ATV riding adventure, after that you will enjoying lunch with Indonesian food lunch buffet, after lunch, the journey continues to the spa, where you will enjoy the 2 hour spa packages we offer where you will enjoy 1 hour balinese massages and 1 hour spa therapy, where spa activities will make your body returned refreshed after doing energy-draining activities. Finished with spa treatments we will return to the hotel by bringing a very impressive experience in combining ATV Ride and Spa Tour packages

title.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali ATV Ride Tour Packages is a Journey to explore the hidden beauty of Bali Islands by riding ATV Bike and assist by professional Bali ATV Ride tour. The journey will explore the beauty of the rice field and see the amazing view of the rice, you can stop here for take picture as much as you want and then continue to passed the local village and see the social activities life at the village. Is great experience vy explore Bali islands in the way you never try before. Try the beat the beatean track we offer during this trip and this is not a speeding tour, it just only sightseeing tour by riding an ATV bike.

title.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Spa Tour Packages we offer is the best spa treatmants to make your day like new again, The treatmants with professional theraphist which already known the best spot and strong pressure to make your body and mind refresh. The 2 hours spa tour pacakges we offer consist of 1 hours balinese massage and 1 hours spa treatmants. The Balinese believe that the body, mind and spirit work in harmony. The health and well being of all make the whole happy. Enjoy this delightful blend of massage techniques: traditional Balinese massage, reflexology, face and hand massage.

price.title: Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour Price :

  • 1 person : IDR 1,450,000 (solo traveler)
  • 2 person : IDR 1,150,000/person
  • 3 person : IDR 1,050,000/person
  • 4 person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 5 person or More : IDR 950,000/person

Remarks :

  • Get Special price group booking

Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • 2 Hours ATV Ride Adventure
  • 2 Hours Spa Packages
  • Professional ATV Ride Guide
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali ATV Ride and Spa Tour Itinerary :

content.event: ATV Ride Finish and enjoy lunch
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Spa finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
